Envato Meet Ups Confirmed - LA and San Fran!

It is with great pleasure I can confirm we are having 2 official Envato meet ups in North America this October! After lots of discussion and consideration of your votes from the ‘your choice of location thread’, we’ve decided on LA and San Fran.
